doc.title: Perry Rhodan - Operation Eastside
doc.plot: In the year 2326, the human race is preparing to conquer the other side of the galaxy, called the "Eastside". They plan to build new colonies on foreign planets. You as the player have to choose among different races and alien species and you have lead the operation to conquer the Eastside. Travel through time and space, through the galaxy, visit new solar systems and planets, create new colonies for your own people and challenge foreign species in a fight of your lifetime.
